attributes.action: Band The Burqa in the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: We need to get this back into the hands of government and hopefully this time they will all come to an agreement to band it! We can only do it with all your help so please sign the petition to make sure that you and your loved ones are safe and live in a safe country! Please.
attributes.background: With all the bombings and killings going on, we simply don't know when or where the next location is. If we ban the burqa no one will be able to hide there identity and get up to anything which could end to a bad ending! Let's band te burqa and try and make The UK a Safer and secure place!
